Write-Up Text: The social media chatter just keeps on coming! Australian people continue to discuss the upcoming Budget with various perspectives being shared. While some commentators criticize political parties others anticipate funding for the NDIS and focus on uplifting women in the economy. It will be interesting to see what initiatives the government introduces regarding energy transformation country areas vaping and increasing taxes. Overall it seems that inflation public investment clean energy housing inequality health and climate change are key topics of concern for the people of Australia.
